ref_item.measure: Change From Baseline in Reduction of Urine Albumin to Creatinine Ratio (ACR) to Week 20
ref_item.description: The dose response effect of AZD5718 on urine ACR at 20 weeks was evaluated. Values less than 1 indicate improvement from baseline.

pred_item.measure: Dose-response effect of AZD5718 on urinary albumin-to-creatinine ratio (UACR)
pred_item.description: Change in UACR from baseline to 20 weeks (on treatment with dapagliflozin as future standard of care). UACR is calculated as urine albumin (mg/dl) divided by urine creatinine (g/dl). The geometric mean UACR is calculated from triplicate first morning urine samples collected on 3 consecutive days before each study visit.

ref_item.measure: Change From Baseline in Reduction of Urine ACR to Week 12
ref_item.description: The dose response effect of AZD5718 on urine ACR at 12 weeks was evaluated. Values less than 1 indicate improvement from baseline.

pred_item.measure: Dose-response effect of AZD5718 on urinary albumin-to-creatinine ratio at 12 weeks
pred_item.description: Change in UACR from baseline to 12 weeks (on current standard of care without dapagliflozin)

ref_item.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Events and Serious Adverse Events
ref_item.description: The safety and tolerability profile of AZD5718 treatment was assessed

pred_item.description: Assessment includes monitoring of adverse events and serious adverse events, physical examinations, vital signs (blood pressure, heart rate, respiratory rate, body temperature, pulse oximetry), electrocardiography, and clinical laboratory tests (chemistry, hematology, coagulation, urinalysis)
pred_item.timeFrame: Throughout the study (up to 24 weeks including follow-up)

ref_item.measure: Change From Baseline in 24-hours Mean Systolic Blood Pressure to Week 12
ref_item.description: The effect of AZD5718 on ambulatory blood pressure was assessed

pred_item.measure: Effect of AZD5718 on ambulatory blood pressure
pred_item.description: Change in 24-hour mean systolic blood pressure from baseline to week 12, using a noninferiority margin of 3 mm Hg

ref_item.description: The PK of AZD5718 after repeated oral dosing for 20 weeks was evaluated

pred_item.description: Pre-dose plasma samples collected throughout the study to assess AZD5718 concentrations. A subgroup of at least 80 participants will provide 4 post-dose samples at 1-2, 2-5, 5-8, and 8-12 hours after receiving AZD5718 at week 4

ref_item.measure: Change From Baseline in Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate (eGFR) to Week 12
ref_item.description: The effect of AZD5718 on renal function was evaluated
ref_item.timeFrame: Week 1 (Baseline), Week 2, Week 4, Week 8, and Week 12

pred_item.measure: Effect of AZD5718 on kidney function with and without dapagliflozin
pred_item.description: Assessment of acute changes in estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR) calculated using the CKD-EPI equation
